name: Orchard Mule
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the vodka and apple cider. Add fresh lime juice. Top off with ginger beer and stir gently to mix.
garnish: Lime wheel and a sprig of mint
backstory: Inspired by the harmonious blend of crisp apple orchards and the zesty snap of ginger, this balanced fruity cocktail refreshes and enlivens with a touch of zest and sweetness.
